alert.note: Alert for McHenry (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 16 at 9:00PM CST until February 17 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Accumulating snow continuing. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch in the southeast half of the county. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...McHenry County. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered, hazardous roads. Patchy blowing snow will further reduce low visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
